item.title: The advantages of using modules in your Android project
item.description: This article will show you how to add and use multiple modules in your Android project. First, let’s explore the benefits of multi-module projects. Advantages Modularity and maintainability Creating smaller, specialized modules make your codebase easier to manage and maintain. For example, feature modules are simpler to understand, test, and update. Code reusability Modules promote code reusability by allowing you to encapsulate common functionalities or components. You can reuse these modules in different app sections, saving time and preventing duplicate code.
